name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 017
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By The LGBTQ Community, and if you don't then leave. It's time for this country, and this world to heal, and we have no room for hate anymore. Let’s all stand by and help one another.
